hero.title: Alarm buttons and safety solutions
hero.subtitle: When every second counts, you want to be sure that help is just one button press away.

whenEverySecond.title: When every second counts
whenEverySecond.text1: You may have thought about it more than once. What if dad suddenly gets chest pain, or mom faints in the kitchen? How quickly can they alert someone, and what if no one is there to hear?
whenEverySecond.text2: It's a painful thought to carry. Our alarm buttons and safety solutions ensure that mom or dad can reach you or healthcare personnel with one simple press, whether they're at home or out.

howAlarmButtonsWork.title: How do alarm buttons work?
howAlarmButtonsWork.text1: They are usually worn around the neck or in the pocket. If something happens, they just press the button and are immediately connected to a pre-selected contact, for example you, another relative or healthcare personnel.
howAlarmButtonsWork.text2: The alarm system can be set up so that it first tries to reach you, then other relatives, and finally healthcare personnel if no one answers.
howAlarmButtonsWork.text3: With two-way communication, they can speak directly with help without having to find the phone.

whereDoesThisFit.title: Where does this fit best?
whereDoesThisFit.outdoor: Outdoors, for elderly who still like to walk or shop themselves. With GPS and mobile network, you can see where they are and get notified if something happens.
whereDoesThisFit.home: At home, as a safety measure in the kitchen, living room or bathroom. One press, and help is on the way.
whereDoesThisFit.dementia: For people with dementia or memory problems, where a safety button provides extra security, both for them and you.

whatAboutFalls.title: What about falls or if they can't press?
whatAboutFalls.text1: An alarm button is fantastic when they can press it themselves. But if they fall and can't reach it, it can be smart to combine it with an automatic fall sensor. Then you also get an alert if they are weak, confused or lose consciousness.
whatAboutFalls.text2: Many choose exactly this combination to be completely safe.

whyChooseOurAlarms.title: Why choose our alarms?
points: Works both indoors and outdoors, wherever there is mobile coverage.
Gives you an alert immediately, not hours later.
Tailored to their needs: alerts can go to you, other relatives, or directly to healthcare personnel.
Secure two-way communication, they get help without having to look for the phone.
No commitment or startup cost, and can be expanded with fall sensors or medical monitoring later.

steps.title: Rental or purchase of equipment
steps.text: The customer gets access to the equipment either through rental or purchase.

steps.title: Choice of recipient
steps.text: The customer decides whether the alarms should go directly to a monitoring station (with external cost) or to their own contacts (for example, relatives or neighbors).

steps.title: When the alarm is triggered
steps.text: If there is an agreement with a monitoring station, the alarm goes there and is handled by them. If the alarm goes to relatives, it will first alert the main contact.

steps.title: The fallback principle
steps.text: If the main contact does not answer, the alarm goes to the next contact (fallback 1). If that contact also does not answer, it goes to fallback 2, and so on. The last fallback can be the monitoring station, if an agreement exists.

steps.title: Action
steps.text: When either the monitoring station or a relative receives and answers the alarm, they will initiate necessary actions. This could be contacting healthcare personnel, going out themselves, or taking other necessary action.

typicalPrice.title: Typical price
typicalPrice.text: Alarm button with GPS and two-way talk costs from around 299 kroner per month, depending on the setup you desire. No binding or hidden costs, and you can always expand with more sensors or medical monitoring later.
typicalPrice.disclaimer: When ordering, there is a deposit of 800 for the sensor, which will be deducted from the monthly rent.

whyRentInstead.title: Why you should rent instead of buy
whyRentInstead.intro: Medical sensors and solutions are costly investments if you purchase them. For private individuals, there is rarely a need to own the equipment - it is only needed as long as the person who needs extra security actually needs it.
whyRentInstead.subtitle: When you rent from NordicMedTek you get:

flexibility.title: Flexibility:
flexibility.text: You only pay for the period you actually need the equipment.

simplerLife.title: Simpler everyday life:
simplerLife.text: We take care of setup, maintenance and return when the need is no longer there.

financialSecurity.title: Financial security:
financialSecurity.text: You avoid tying up large sums in equipment that might otherwise sit unused.

whyRentInstead.conclusion: Many competitors only offer purchase, but NordicMedTek believes renting is the most sensible and gentle solution for private individuals. When needs change, the rental can be easily terminated and products returned - you pay only for what you need and get access to modern, reliable solutions without unnecessary risk.

whatDoIDoNow.title: What do I do now
whatDoIDoNow.text: Tell us a little about the situation at home, and we will help you find a solution that fits.

stillUnsure.title: Still unsure?
stillUnsure.text: We can help you find the right solution or answer questions you may have.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions about alarm products

items.question: Does the alarm only work at home?
items.answer: No, we have models with 4G and GPS that work everywhere with mobile coverage, at the store, on a trip, or at the neighbor's.

items.question: What happens when they press the button?
items.answer: The alarm calls pre-selected contacts or a control room. With two-way talk, they can speak directly for help without having to look for the phone.

items.question: What if they don't manage to press?
items.answer: Advanced models have a built-in fall alarm that is triggered automatically if they fall.

items.question: Are the data safe?
items.answer: Yes. All data is handled in accordance with GDPR and stored on servers in Norway.

items.question: Is this difficult to set up?
items.answer: No. The alarms are designed to be as easy to use as a small remote control. All our products are designed to be very easy to set up and will in most cases be set up when you receive them. Should anything local be necessary, we set up the system together with you, so you know everything works. All data is handled securely, stored on servers in Norway, and follows strict rules for personal privacy.

readyForQuickHelp.title: Ready to give them the opportunity for quick help?
readyForQuickHelp.text: Tell us a little about the situation at home with mom or dad, and we will find together what suits best. It is completely non-binding.

nextSteps.title: Next step
nextSteps.text: Don't wait until after a fall. Let us help you secure the everyday life of your mother or father, before something happens.

moreTechnical.title: Do you want to see more technical?
moreTechnical.text1: Do you want to read more about the specific sensors used to detect falls, how they are mounted, and what variants are available?
moreTechnical.text2: Here you will find an overview of products suitable for safety and fall protection at home. You can also see how these sensors can be combined with alarm buttons or medical follow-up, to get a complete solution at home.
moreTechnical.button: See products for safety and fall protection at home

hero.title: Medical follow-up at home
hero.subtitle1: In most Norwegian municipalities, there are elderly people who are too healthy to be admitted to a hospital, but who nevertheless need closer follow-up than what, for example, home nursing care has the capacity for.
hero.subtitle2: There is also a large group that we call younger elderly. These are people who are too healthy to be entitled to municipal home help services.
hero.secondaryTitle: Security for you and good health follow-up for them
hero.description1: You may worry about your elderly parents becoming frail, especially if they already have health conditions like heart problems, breathing difficulties, or diabetes. This increases your concern.
hero.question1: How do you know everything is okay between doctor's visits?
hero.question2: What if the values suddenly worsen, and no one discovers it in time?
hero.description2: Our solutions for medical follow-up give you and your family a whole new sense of security. They automatically monitor important health values, and if some measurements become critical, you will receive an alarm via SMS. Various forms of automatic alerts can be ordered. If you are concerned that medical data should be monitored by healthcare personnel and doctors, we refer you to our partner salubi.no, who has very good solutions for this

solutions.title: Our solutions for private individuals are divided into two segments

security.title: If you want a solution that focuses on security, more than medical follow-up of your loved ones, we have good solutions for this. Read more below

medical.title: Our partner Salubi offers an extended solution with **Specialized digital health services.** Qualified healthcare personnel and doctors will monitor the user's medical data. Go to saluba.no

whenEverySecond.title: When health monitoring matters
whenEverySecond.text1: You may have thought about it more than once. What if dad's blood pressure spikes, or mom's blood sugar drops dangerously low? How quickly can you detect these changes, and what if no one is there to monitor?
whenEverySecond.text2: It's a concern that weighs on many families. Our medical monitoring solutions ensure continuous tracking of vital signs, with automatic alerts when intervention is needed.

howMedicalMonitoring.title: How does medical follow-up work at home?
howMedicalMonitoring.text1: Sensors can be placed under the mattress, on the chair where they sit most, or connected to the body with simple measuring instruments. These measure completely contactlessly or with small units that are used for just a few seconds at a time.
howMedicalMonitoring.subtitle: Typically they can measure:
howMedicalMonitoring.measurement4: Sleep and deviations that may indicate something is wrong
howMedicalMonitoring.text2: A number of sensors can be selected, and everything is set up automatically. There are no requirements for technical competence to use our system.
howMedicalMonitoring.imageAlt1: Sensors and placements for medical monitoring
howMedicalMonitoring.imageAlt2: System overview of medical monitoring devices

combinedWithEasyContact.title: Combined with easy contact with the doctor and family
combinedWithEasyContact.text1: For many elderly, it is safe to know that both health and contact with the outside world are taken care of simultaneously. With easeBlink get a dedicated screen at home that allows mom or dad to
combinedWithEasyContact.feature1: have video consultations with the general practitioner, such as collecting measurements of pulse, breath, and blood pressure,
combinedWithEasyContact.feature2: measurements of pulse, breath, and blood pressure,
combinedWithEasyContact.feature3: receive messages and pictures from the family,
combinedWithEasyContact.feature4: and have one button to press to talk to you or healthcare personnel.
combinedWithEasyContact.text2: This provides both medical safety and social contact in the same solution.
combinedWithEasyContact.imageAlt: Combined medical monitoring and family communication system

whereDoesThisFitBest.title: Where does this fit best?

useCase1.title: For elderly with known heart disease or breathing difficulties...
useCase1.description: For elderly with known heart disease or breathing difficulties, where it is important to detect changes early.
useCase1.alt: Elderly man with chest pain and heart monitoring

useCase2.title: After hospital stay...
useCase2.description: After hospital stay, for example after surgery or infection, when one wants to follow up extra well.
useCase2.alt: Person in bed with medical monitoring devices

useCase3.title: For diabetes or blood pressure problems...
useCase3.description: For diabetes or blood pressure problems, so that one can adjust medications faster.
useCase3.alt: Elderly man taking blood pressure measurement

whereDoesThisFitBest.generalBenefit: This gives both you and them peace of mind in everyday life, and reduces the need for many unnecessary trips to the doctor's office.

whyChoose.title: Why choose this?
whyChoose.point1: Measurements happen completely automatically, without them having to remember to do anything themselves in everyday life.
whyChoose.point2: Data can be shared directly with the general practitioner, who can then adjust medications or ask them to come in before something develops.
whyChoose.point3: Everything takes place at home, in their safe environment, without stress and travel.

steps.title: Lease or purchase of equipment
steps.text: The customer gains access to the equipment either through lease or purchase.

steps.title: Choice of recipient
steps.text: The customer decides whether the alarms should go directly to an emergency center (at an external cost) or to their own contacts (for example, relatives or neighbors).

steps.title: When the alarm is triggered
steps.text: If there is an agreement with an emergency center, the alarm goes there and is handled by them. If the alarm goes to relatives, it will first notify the main contact.

steps.title: The Fallback Principle
steps.text: If the main contact does not answer, the alarm goes to the next contact (fallback 1). If that contact also does not answer, it goes to fallback 2, and so on. The last fallback can be the emergency center, if an agreement exists.

steps.title: Measures/Actions
steps.text: When either the emergency center or a relative receives and answers the alarm, they will implement necessary measures. This could be contacting healthcare personnel, responding themselves, or taking other necessary action.

typicalPrice.title: Typical price for medical monitoring
typicalPrice.text: Medical monitoring solutions start from around 499 kroner per month, depending on the number of sensors and monitoring parameters needed. No binding or hidden costs, and you can always adjust the monitoring level as health needs change.
typicalPrice.disclaimer: When ordering, there is a deposit for the medical sensors, which will be deducted from the monthly rent.

whyRentInstead.title: Why rent medical monitoring equipment?
whyRentInstead.intro: Medical monitoring equipment represents a significant investment if purchased outright. For most families, renting provides the flexibility and cost-effectiveness needed for long-term health monitoring.
whyRentInstead.subtitle: When you rent medical monitoring from NordicMedTek you get:

flexibility.title: Flexibility:
flexibility.text: Adjust monitoring parameters and equipment as health needs change over time.

simplerLife.title: Simplified management:
simplerLife.text: We handle equipment maintenance, updates, and technical support so you can focus on health.

financialSecurity.title: Cost predictability:
financialSecurity.text: Fixed monthly costs with no unexpected maintenance or upgrade expenses.

whyRentInstead.conclusion: Medical monitoring is most effective when it can adapt to changing health needs. Renting allows you to access the latest technology without the burden of ownership, ensuring your loved ones always have the most appropriate monitoring solution.

whatDoIDoNow.title: What do I do now?
whatDoIDoNow.text: Tell us about your health monitoring needs, and we'll help you find the right medical monitoring solution.

stillUnsure.title: Still unsure about medical monitoring?
stillUnsure.text: We can help you understand how medical monitoring works and determine if it's right for your situation.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions about medical monitoring

items.question: How accurate are the medical sensors?
items.answer: Our medical sensors are clinically validated and provide accurate readings comparable to traditional medical devices. They are designed for continuous monitoring in home settings.

items.question: What happens if the sensors detect a problem?
items.answer: The system automatically alerts healthcare personnel or designated contacts with detailed information about the concerning readings, allowing for prompt medical intervention.

items.question: Can the sensors be worn comfortably all day?
items.answer: Yes, our sensors are designed to be lightweight, discreet, and comfortable for continuous wear without interfering with daily activities.

items.question: Is the medical data secure and private?
items.answer: Absolutely. All medical data is encrypted, stored securely on Norwegian servers, and handled in strict compliance with GDPR and medical privacy regulations.

items.question: How does this integrate with existing healthcare?
items.answer: Our system can integrate with healthcare provider systems, allowing medical professionals to access monitoring data and make informed treatment decisions.

readyForQuickHelp.title: Ready to ensure safety and quick help?
readyForQuickHelp.text: Tell us a little about how the situation looks at home with mom or dad, and we will find the solution that fits best.

nextSteps.title: Next step
nextSteps.text: Don't wait for a health crisis. Let us help you implement proactive health monitoring for your loved ones.

moreTechnical.title: Want to see more technical details?
moreTechnical.text1: Do you want to read more about the specific medical sensors used for monitoring, how they work, and what health parameters they can track?
moreTechnical.text2: Here you will find detailed information about our medical monitoring products, including specifications, accuracy data, and integration capabilities with healthcare systems.
moreTechnical.button: See medical monitoring products and specifications

hero.title: Fall sensors and safety at home
hero.subtitle: Prevent a fall from changing everything. Our sensors detect falls completely automatically.
hero.secondaryTitle: Prevent a fall from changing everything
hero.description1: A small fall can have major consequences. A hip fracture or hours alone on the floor can mean that mom or dad never fully recovers. Perhaps you have already noticed that balance fails a little more often, or that they seem more unsteady on the stairs or in the bathroom.
hero.description2: Many elderly people also become afraid after a fall. They withdraw and dare less, and quality of life declines along with safety. As a relative, you carry a worry, what if it happens when no one is there?
hero.description3: Our fall sensors cannot prevent all falls, but they ensure that a fall is never left undetected.

whenEverySecond.title: When falls happen unexpectedly
whenEverySecond.text1: You may have worried about it more than once. What if mom falls in the bathroom, or dad trips on the stairs? How quickly can they get help, and what if no one is there to hear them?
whenEverySecond.text2: It's a concern that weighs on many families. Our discrete fall sensors automatically detect falls and send immediate alerts to you or healthcare personnel, ensuring help is always available.

howFallSensorsWork.title: How do fall sensors work?
howFallSensorsWork.text1: Our sensors use radar or infrared technology to detect falls automatically, and can be placed in the living room, bedroom, stairs or bathroom. They capture movement patterns and alert when something is not right, for example if someone falls and does not get up again.
howFallSensorsWork.subtitle: This means:
howFallSensorsWork.benefit1: Mom or dad doesn't need to remember to wear anything.
howFallSensorsWork.benefit2: You get a notification immediately, and can contact them or send help.
howFallSensorsWork.benefit3: The system can also notify healthcare personnel directly if you wish.
howFallSensorsWork.text2: When a fall is detected, the system immediately sends alerts to pre-selected contacts or healthcare personnel. The sensors can distinguish between normal activities and actual falls to reduce false alarms.

whereDoesThisFitBest.title: Where do fall sensors fit best?

useCase1.title: Bathroom Safety
useCase1.description: Bathroom safety: The most common placement for falls, our sensors provide immediate detection and alert when slips or falls occur in wet, slippery conditions.

useCase2.title: Bedroom Monitoring
useCase2.description: Bedroom monitoring: Detect falls that occur when getting in or out of bed, or during nighttime activities, and provides security for both residents and caregivers.

useCase3.title: Stair Safety
useCase3.description: Stair safety: Monitor stairs for falls and provide immediate alerts when someone stumbles or falls on steps, ensuring quick assistance when mobility is compromised.

whereDoesThisFitBest.generalBenefit: Many choose to have sensors in several rooms, to cover the entire home and avoid the worry of a fall happening in a "blind spot". All our sensors are discreet and are placed on the wall or ceiling. If you have mounted a picture, you can easily do this yourself.

whyChooseOurFallSensors.title: Why choose our fall sensors?
points: Automatic fall detection, regardless of whether the user remembers an alarm.
Immediate alerts to the user or healthcare personnel.
Connectivity to security alarms, video screens, or medical monitoring for a complete solution.
Secure data storage in Norway, adhering to strict privacy requirements.

familyContactSecurity.title: Also security in the form of contact with family
familyContactSecurity.description: This section includes how fall sensors enhance safety through family contact. It introduces "easeBlink," a screen with user-friendly buttons that allows elderly parents to receive photos and messages from family and easily make video calls, providing a sense of security even when living alone.
familyContactSecurity.imageAlt: Family contact interface showing photos and messages

whatDistinguishesFromAlarmButton.title: What distinguishes this from an alarm button?
whatDistinguishesFromAlarmButton.description: Alarm buttons rely on the user remembering to wear them and being able to press them. In contrast, fall sensors operate autonomously, alerting immediately if something happens, even if the user is weak, confused, or unable to press a button. This provides an extra layer of security beyond an alarm button.

steps.title: Fall detection
steps.text: Sensors continuously monitor for fall patterns and sudden impacts in designated areas of the home.

steps.title: Alert generation
steps.text: When a fall is detected, the system immediately generates alerts to pre-selected contacts or healthcare personnel.

steps.title: Contact notification
steps.text: Alerts are sent via multiple channels - phone calls, text messages, and app notifications to ensure someone is reached quickly.

steps.title: Response coordination
steps.text: The system can coordinate with healthcare providers or emergency services if immediate medical attention is needed.

steps.title: Follow-up monitoring
steps.text: After an alert, the system continues monitoring to ensure the person's safety and can provide additional assistance if needed.

typicalPrice.title: Typical price for fall sensors
typicalPrice.text: Fall sensor solutions start from around 399 kroner per month, depending on the number of sensors and areas to be monitored. No binding or hidden costs, and you can always adjust the monitoring coverage as needs change.
typicalPrice.disclaimer: When ordering, there is a deposit for the fall sensors, which will be deducted from the monthly rent.

whyRentInstead.title: Why rent fall sensor equipment?
whyRentInstead.intro: Fall sensor equipment represents a significant investment if purchased outright. For most families, renting provides the flexibility and cost-effectiveness needed for comprehensive home safety monitoring.
whyRentInstead.subtitle: When you rent fall sensors from NordicMedTek you get:

flexibility.title: Flexibility:
flexibility.text: Adjust sensor placement and coverage as safety needs change or as the person's mobility changes over time.

simplerLife.title: Simplified management:
simplerLife.text: We handle sensor installation, maintenance, and technical support so you can focus on safety and peace of mind.

financialSecurity.title: Cost predictability:
financialSecurity.text: Fixed monthly costs with no unexpected maintenance, repair, or upgrade expenses.

whyRentInstead.conclusion: Fall prevention is most effective when it can adapt to changing needs and home layouts. Renting allows you to access the latest sensor technology without the burden of ownership, ensuring your loved ones always have the most appropriate safety monitoring solution.

whatDoIDoNow.title: What do I do now?
whatDoIDoNow.text: Tell us about your fall safety concerns, and we'll help you find the right fall sensor solution for your home.

stillUnsure.title: Still unsure about fall sensors?
stillUnsure.text: We can help you understand how fall sensors work and determine if they're right for your safety needs.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions about fall sensors

items.question: Does mom or dad have to wear something?
items.answer: No. That's the whole point. The sensors detect falls automatically, without them having to remember a button or a wristband.

items.question: Is it difficult to install?
items.answer: No. If you've managed to hang a picture, you can do this. We send simple instructions.

items.question: What if they just sit down quickly, will that trigger an alarm?
items.answer: The sensors are designed to distinguish between normal movements and falls, so that unnecessary alarms are not triggered.

items.question: Are the data safe?
items.answer: Yes. All data is stored in Norway, and we follow GDPR and DPIA so you can be confident about your privacy.

readyForQuickHelp.title: Ready to ensure safety and quick help?
readyForQuickHelp.text: Tell us a little about how the situation looks at home with mom or dad, and we will find the solution that fits best.

nextSteps.title: Next step
nextSteps.text: Don't wait for a fall to happen. Let us help you implement proactive fall safety monitoring for your loved ones.

moreTechnical.title: Want to see more technical details?
moreTechnical.text1: Do you want to read more about the specific fall sensor technology used, how the sensors are installed, and what types of falls they can detect?
moreTechnical.text2: Here you will find detailed information about our fall sensor products, including technical specifications, installation requirements, and integration capabilities with other safety systems.
moreTechnical.button: See fall sensor products and specifications

hero.lead: Smart monitoring that provides peace of mind for families and caregivers

hero.title: Find the help you need. We're just one conversation away
hero.subtitle: We offer free guidance, meetings and non-binding contact. Choose what suits you best.
hero.imageAlt: Elderly man talking on phone with video call

items.title: Relatives
items.text: Guidance on creating safety at home

items.title: Home care managers
items.text: Book a meeting and see how it helps the workflow

items.title: Decision makers
items.text: Overview and answers to what you need

fallDetection.title: Advanced fall alarm technology
fallDetection.subtitle: discrete monitoring that respects privacy
fallDetection.description1: Our radar-based fall alarm uses advanced technology to detect falls without compromising privacy. The sensor is discretely mounted on the wall and monitors movements 24/7.
fallDetection.description2: The system sends immediate alerts for suspected falls, so help can arrive quickly when it's needed most. No cameras, no recordings - just safety.

trygghet.title: Safety
trygghet.subtitle: Safety-creating technology
trygghet.description1: In the face of an aging population and increasing demand for healthcare services, welfare technology and sensor-based solutions play an increasingly important role. These technologies not only provide increased safety for the elderly but also better tools for healthcare professionals and greater security for relatives.
trygghet.description2: Our solution integrates seamlessly into daily life, so users can live safely and independently in their own homes, while family and caregivers get peace of mind.

medicalHome.title: medical@home
medicalHome.subtitle: Advanced home monitoring
medicalHome.description1: Medical@Home is a new way of thinking about health – where advanced technology meets everyday comfort. It's about giving people the opportunity to live safely and independently at home, while health is monitored continuously and discreetly.
medicalHome.description2: Our large package of sensors allows us to offer a complete solution for such a task. From heart rate and movement patterns to sleep quality and activity levels – everything is monitored automatically and provides valuable information to both users and healthcare personnel.

easeBlink.title: easeBlink
easeBlink.subtitle: Safety-creating technology
easeBlink.description1: Many elderly, especially those with limited mobility, experience isolation. Video calls allow them to maintain contact with family and friends, see their faces and hear their voices in real-time, fostering a sense of presence and community that traditional phone calls and text messages cannot replace.
easeBlink.description2: Image sharing in the form of a digital carousel enables sharing memories, celebrations, and everyday moments. This feature brings joy and provides conversation topics. The solution has a very simple user interface, making it accessible for elderly people with varying degrees of cognitive impairment.
easeBlink.link: read more about the camera hook here

madeInNorway.title: Made in Norway
madeInNorway.subtitle: Therefore you should choose a product made in Norway
madeInNorway.description1: When you choose a product made in Norway, you choose more than just quality – you invest in sustainability, safety, and pride.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Norwegian products are known for their high standard. With a focus on precision, good craftsmanship, and carefully selected materials, you get a product that lasts – and delivers, time and time again.

sustainability.title: Sustainable and responsible production
sustainability.description: Production in Norway follows strict environmental requirements and ethical work practices. This means you support a greener future and fair working conditions – without compromising on quality. With the exception of some simple third-party Bluetooth devices, all our products are produced in Norway.

municipalities.title: For municipalities
municipalities.description: Scalable solutions that reduce costs and improve care quality.

healthcare.title: For healthcare personnel
healthcare.description: Alerts and insights that enable you to help at the right time.

relatives.title: For relatives
relatives.description: Peace of mind for the family without the elderly losing their independence.

partners.title: For partners
partners.description: A future-oriented health technology company delivering innovative solutions.

why.title: Why - our purpose
why.description: We believe that everyone deserves to live with dignity and independence in their own homes. Our mission is to give elderly people security and their families peace of mind in everyday life, while providing caregivers with reliable tools to deliver the best possible care.

how.title: How - our approach
how.description: Our technology is discreet, reliable and trustworthy. We use sensors, a gateway and a cloud solution that monitors patterns and sends alerts only when action is needed. This ensures safety without unnecessary disruptions.

what.title: What - our solutions
solutions: Bed sensors that detect presence, movement and activity patterns
Gateway that sends data securely without extra user effort
Cloud solution that analyzes signals in real time
Alerts and dashboards for families, municipalities and healthcare personnel

benefits.title: Benefits
items: For families: peace of mind in everyday life
For caregivers: clear and actionable alerts, not noise
For municipalities: a scalable solution that reduces costs for institutional care

cta1.title: Ready to make your home safer?

questions.question: Is it difficult to install?
questions.answer: No, you can install the solution yourself. We provide you with all necessary guidance.

questions.question: What does it cost?
questions.answer: Solutions start from approximately 299 NOK per month, depending on chosen sensors/services.

questions.question: Do we need internet?
questions.answer: No, all our systems are designed so that we are not dependent on Wi-Fi or ethernet cable. We use this if it exists, but if this is not available, the solution will use the mobile network.

questions.question: Is the data secure?
questions.answer: Yes, data is stored on servers in Norway and follows strict privacy requirements (GDPR and DPIA).

cta2.title: Ready to find safety at home?
cta2.description: We are here to answer questions and help you choose the right solution for your loved ones.

form.title: Book guidance or meeting

form.name: Your name
form.note: All inquiries are non-binding. We'll reply quickly.

municipality.title: For municipalities

company.title: For companies
company.p: White-label operations with a dedicated instance per partner and APIs.

partners.title: Partners
partners.p: Become a partner and get your own cloud instance, training and marketing materials.

guidance.title: Guidance and advice
guidance.p: Get free guidance from our team. We'll help you choose the right solution for you or your organization.

demo.title: Demo and pilots
demo.p: See how it works in practice. Book a demonstration or pilot.

experiences.title: Experiences and case studies
experiences.p: Learn how others use the solution and the benefits they achieve.

documents.title: Documentation and security
documents.p: Everything you need for procurement: data security, architecture, operations and processes.

pricing.title: Pricing and models
pricing.p: Simpler and more predictable with leasing. Choose the model that fits best.

support.title: Support and delivery
support.p: We make sure everything works all the way – from onboarding to operations.

evidence.title: Evidence and impact
evidence.p: Documented results that build confidence for users and decision-makers.

hero.title: Take care of your loved ones - safely, simply, and at home
hero.description: For you as a relative who needs follow-up of your loved ones at home. Our unique sensors automatically detect irregularities related to safety and security, so you can get alerts when needed.

solutions.title: Our solutions for private individuals are divided into two segments

security.title: If you want a solution that focuses on security, more than medical follow-up of your loved ones, we have good solutions for this. Read more below

medical.title: Our partner Salubi offers an extended solution with **Specialized digital health services.** Qualified healthcare personnel and doctors will monitor the user's medical data. Go to saluba.no

alarm.title: That they won't be able to say something?
alarm.description: Solutions for alarm and communication include alerts for sudden illness, two-way communication with video, and geofence functions that give you peace of mind when your loved ones are home or out.

medical.title: For acute illness?
medical.description: Monitoring for heart problems, diabetes and regular measurements of breathing, blood pressure, sleep, blood sugar, body temperature and oxygen saturation. Automatic alerts for deviations.

safety.title: For falls at home?
safety.description: Worried about falls in the bathroom, on the stairs or in the bedroom? Our discrete fall sensors automatically detect falls and send immediate alerts to you or healthcare personnel.

guidance.title: Not sure what you need?
guidance.description: Tell us about everyday life at home with your loved ones, and you'll get a non-binding proposal for solutions that are perfect for you.

whyChoose.title: Why choose us?
whyChoose.easySetup: You don't need to be technical. If you've managed to hang up a picture, you can set this up.
whyChoose.security: Our solutions are made for Norwegian homes and follow strict requirements for privacy and data security.
whyChoose.modular: You can start simple and expand later if needs change.
whyChoose.noHiddenCosts: Everything is without commitment and hidden startup costs.

questions.question: Is it difficult to install?
questions.answer: No, it's as easy as hanging up a picture. We give you all necessary guidance and support during installation.

questions.question: What does it cost?
questions.answer: Solutions start from approximately 299 NOK per month, depending on which sensors and services you choose.

questions.question: Do we need internet?
questions.answer: Yes, internet is necessary for the systems to be able to send alerts and share data. We can help with suggestions if internet is not available.

questions.question: Is the data secure?
questions.answer: Yes, all data is stored on servers in Norway and follows strict privacy requirements (GDPR and DPIA).

finalCta.description: We are here to answer questions and help you choose the right solution for your loved ones.

finalCta.title: Ready to find safety at home?
finalCta.description: We are here to answer questions and help you choose the right solution for your loved ones.

hero.title: Fall alarms that detect without requiring anything from the user
hero.description: The Guardian series provides safety through contactless sensors that detect falls and critical incidents - without a camera and without the user having to wear anything.
hero.imageCaption: Elderly person sleeping peacefully in a bed, while a small sensor on the wall discreetly monitors the room

whyGuardian.title: Safety without intrusion in everyday life
whyGuardian.description: Many falls occur when no one is present, and traditional alarms require users to wear a button or clock. The Guardian series automatically detects events, with sensors working silently in the background, preserving privacy, and notifying when something happens.

feature1.title: Contactless
feature1.description: No wearing or button to remember.

feature3.title: Integration
feature3.description: Can be connected to both municipal alarm centers and relatives.

products.title: Choose the right solution for your needs

guardianWall.title: Guardian Wall
guardianWall.description: Wall-mounted sensor that detects falls and abnormal movements.
guardianWall.bestFor: Best for living rooms and smaller rooms.

guardianWallPro.title: Guardian Wall Pro
guardianWallPro.description: Extended wall model with more advanced event recognition and integration with medical systems.
guardianWallPro.bestFor: Best for rooms where health status is closely monitored.

guardianCeiling.title: Guardian Ceiling
guardianCeiling.description: Ceiling-mounted sensor with wide coverage of the entire room.
guardianCeiling.bestFor: Best for bedrooms and common areas.

guardianCeilingPro.title: Guardian Ceiling Pro
guardianCeilingPro.description: Combines fall monitoring with registration of vital patterns (ballistocardiography).
guardianCeilingPro.bestFor: Best for users with high risk or need for close medical follow-up.

completePackage.title: What a complete package consists of
completePackage.subtitle: From sensor to action - all in one solution
completePackage.description: A Guardian installation can be set up at home or in the municipality, and consists of:

component2.title: VitalHub (CoreHub)
component2.description: Collects data and sends securely to cloud or alarm center.

component3.title: Alarm reception
component3.description: Notification to municipality, relatives or alarm center.

component4.title: Fallback structure
component4.description: Multiple contacts in sequence if the first does not respond.

component5.title: Support and operation
component5.description: Setup, service and simple return arrangement for rental.

whoIsVital.title: Who is the Vital series for?
whoIsVital.subtitle: Security for everyone who has responsibility

relatives.title: Relatives
relatives.description: Detects falls even when you are not there. No camera, no button

municipality.title: The Municipality
municipality.description: Better overview and fewer manual inspections. Integrates with existing systems

partners.title: Partners
partners.description: Plug-and-play sensors with open API. Low failure rate and fast installation

investors.title: Investors
investors.description: Growing market, with a unique space between consumer products and clinical systems.

howGuardianWorks.title: Do you want to see how the Guardian series works in practice?
howGuardianWorks.button2: Start a pilot in home care services
howGuardianWorks.subtitle: These are the products that keep an eye on the user
howGuardianWorks.description: A complete solution for safety and fall protection at home usually consists of three parts:
howGuardianWorks.component1: Fall sensors mounted on the wall or ceiling that detect if someone falls and does not get up again.
howGuardianWorks.component2: A central unit that collects data from the sensors and sends it securely to the cloud, so that you and healthcare personnel can follow along.
howGuardianWorks.component3: Optional alarm button, which mother or father can press if they feel unwell or need help, before something happens.
howGuardianWorks.purpose: This is equipment made for completely ordinary homes, so that mother or father can continue to live safely at home, while you can feel safe that they will not be left alone after a fall.
howGuardianWorks.conclusion: How a complete solution is built

step1.title: Sensors that detect falls
step1.description: Small sensors are mounted on walls or ceilings in high-risk areas for falls, such as bathrooms, living rooms, or stairs. They use radar and infrared technology to monitor movement patterns and detect sudden changes, such as falls.
step1.products: GuardianSense and GuardianSense Pro for both wall and ceiling mounting, which cover larger areas and can also measure breath and pulse.

step2.title: Sensors that measure breath and pulse
step2.description: For extra safety, a sensor can be placed under a mattress or in a chair. It measures breath and pulse without the user noticing, and can alert if values suddenly change.
step2.products: VitalSense Pad and VitalTrack for this purpose.

step3.title: Central unit that connects everything
step3.description: For the sensors to be able to send data, a small box is needed at home. CoreHub or sensorCentral collects data from all sensors and sends it securely to the cloud.
step3.products: CoreHub or sensorCentral - necessary for the system to function.

step4.title: Can be combined with an alarm button
step4.description: Even with automatic fall detection, many choose to add an alarm button worn around the neck or in a pocket. This allows the user to press for help immediately if they feel something is wrong.
step4.products: Call button with 4G and GPS that works both at home and outside, or Local call button that connects directly to the home central.

hero.subtitle: When new solutions are considered, experiences from others are often the best decision support.

contactForm.footerNote: All inquiries are non-binding. You are not obligated to anything. We will respond as quickly as we can

bottom.description: Our solutions are already in use in Norwegian municipalities. The experiences show that they provide both better security for the users and more efficient operation of the service

hero.title: Safety and dignity for the elderly – lower costs for the municipality.
hero.description1: As a politician, you must make decisions that provide the greatest possible societal benefit.
hero.description2: Our sensors and systems contribute to fewer hospital admissions, safer elderly, and more sustainable operation of the municipality. Results you can stand by.

challenges.title: The challenges the municipality faces today
challenges.subtitle: The societal challenge
challenges.intro: Norwegian municipalities are facing an aging population wave:
challenges.challenge1: More elderly wish to live at home longer.
challenges.challenge2: Home care services have fewer staff per patient.
challenges.challenge3: Every unnecessary admission increases costs and pressures the healthcare service.
challenges.conclusion: Without new solutions, the gap between needs and resources will only grow.

benefit2.title: Lower costs
benefit2.description: The municipality saves significant sums on prevention.

benefit3.title: Better working conditions
benefit3.description: Employees get a more predictable work day.

benefit4.title: Safety and dignity
benefit4.description: Elderly get to live at home longer, with increased safety.

ceMarking.title: CE-marked and MDR-compatible medical equipment
ceMarking.description: All our products are CE-marked and developed in accordance with MDR (Medical Device Regulation). This ensures safety, quality and reliability for municipalities and healthcare personnel, and enables the technology to be seamlessly integrated into public operations without endangering lives.

gdpr.title: Data security in line with GDPR
gdpr.description: Our systems are built with the highest degree of data security and privacy. We are fully GDPR-compliant, and sensitive health data is encrypted with clear routines for storage, access and sharing. This enables municipalities to use the technology without legal concerns or loss of public trust.

tested.title: Reliable technology tested in Norwegian municipalities
tested.description: Our solutions have already been tested in Norwegian municipalities and documented to work in practice. This means the technology is not just theoretical, but reliable in real healthcare and care services, and addresses existing needs, routines and challenges. Experience shows that it can reduce unnecessary supervision, free up time for employees, and at the same time increase user safety.

cases.title: Case and Stories
cases.pilotResults: In a pilot municipality, the system resulted in:
cases.result1: 10 fewer hospital admissions per 100 users per year.
cases.result2: Greater security for employees and relatives.
cases.quote: This is an example of technology that provides both better services and lower costs. It is a responsible choice for the municipality.

nextSteps.title: What is the next step?
nextSteps.subtitle: Do you want to see how this can strengthen your municipality?

brief.title: Read the short version of benefits in our politician brief
brief.description: A concise overview that explains how the technology can provide better care, lower costs, and safer working conditions. Adapted for decision-makers who need a quick, clear summary with figures and examples.

presentation.title: Order a presentation for the executive committee or committee
presentation.description: We will come to you and present the solution with concrete examples from Norwegian municipalities. The presentation can be adapted to your local challenges, and provides an opportunity for questions and dialogue with both politicians and administration.

benefits.title: Benefits for the municipality and society

benefit1.title: Fewer hospital admissions
benefit1.description: Our sensors detect health problems early, reducing the need for acute hospital treatment and thus municipal costs.

benefit2.title: Sustainable operation

benefit3.title: Safety and dignity
benefit3.description: Elderly can live at home longer with increased safety, while families get peace of mind and the municipality delivers better services.

hero.title: Easier everyday for employees - safer life for users
hero.description: As a leader for home care services, you know how pressured everyday life is. Our sensors and systems help you and your staff detect critical events between visits, provide better overview and make prioritization easier - without creating extra work.
hero.button2: See how this works in practice

uncertainty.title: Uncertainty between visits
uncertainty.description: In home care services, the biggest concerns arise when no one is present. Many falls and health changes occur between visits, and staff must live with the uncertainty of whether something happens during the night or the hours between.

pressure.title: Pressured workday
pressure.description: At the same time, the workday is pressured: short time windows per visit, constantly more patients and a feeling of always being a bit behind. This creates stress for employees and increased risk for patients.

solution.title: The solution briefly explained
solution.subtitle: Three building blocks give the municipality control:

centralOverview.title: Central overview
centralOverview.description: The municipality gets real-time data and can prioritize resources correctly.

benefits.benefit1: Less stress and worry about what happens between visits.
benefits.benefit2: Better overview makes it easier to prioritize correctly.
benefits.benefit3: Increased safety for both employees and relatives.
benefits.benefit4: Opportunity to work more preventively instead of handling crises.
benefits.quote: We get quick notification when something happens, and can act immediately. It provides safety for both patients and for us as employees.

whyChooseUs.title: Why choose us in your care environment
points: Sensors developed for continuous operation without frequent maintenance
Gateway that sends data securely and stably to the cloud
Alerts that go directly to the guard room when needed, and not otherwise
Documentation that makes implementation easy and safe

whatThisMeans.title: What this means for you as a partner
points: You can deliver a solution that is easy to install and maintain
You strengthen your sales offer with technology that is already MDR-approved
You give your customers a solution that reduces false alarms and increases trust in the entire system
You avoid uncertainty, because we deliver finished product sheets, training, and technical support

howItWorks.title: How it works in practice
steps: The sensors register movement and activity in the bed.
Data is sent securely via gateway to the cloud solution.
The system alerts the guard room if something deviates from the norm.
Healthcare personnel can act quickly and targeted.

partnerBenefits.title: Partner benefits for suppliers of care environments
points: Ready integration guides
Technical specifications and certificates easily accessible
Support when you need it, so you can deliver with confidence

vaktromIntegration.footer: NordicMedTek - Integration solutions for modern care

hero.title: A partnership that provides security and growth
hero.description: As a partner at NordicMedTek, you get more than just a product. You get documented technology, dedicated support, and access to resources that make it easy to succeed in the welfare technology market.

whyBecomePartner.title: Why become a partner
points: Ready material that makes sales and implementation easier
Technical and commercial support from day one
A collaboration that builds trust both with customers and in the market

steps.title: 1. Startup:
steps.description: access to training, product sheets, and certificates

steps.title: 2. Launch:
steps.description: marketing material and support in the sales process

steps.title: 4. Development:
steps.description: opportunity to participate in new pilots and solutions

hero.title: Competitive advantage in a demanding market
hero.description1: With our sensors and cloud solution, you get reliable technology that strengthens the quality of your services and reduces unnecessary resource use.
hero.description2: This gives you a clear advantage in a competitive market.

advantages.title: Why this gives you an advantage
advantages.point1: Technology that warns early and reduces the risk of accidents
advantages.point2: Less need for manual supervision frees up time for tasks that truly matter
advantages.point3: Increased safety for both users and relatives
advantages.point4: A solution that builds trust in the market because it is CE-marked and MDR-approved

business.title: How this strengthens your business
business.point1: You can deliver higher quality services without increasing costs
business.point2: You stand out from competitors who have not adopted modern care technology
business.point3: You provide peace of mind to relatives, which strengthens your reputation and customer base
business.point4: You show that you are committed to innovation and sustainable care

partners.title: Partner benefits for private providers
partners.point1: Easy implementation without the need for extensive IT resources
partners.point2: Training and support that ensures your employees quickly adopt the system
partners.point3: Product sheets and case studies you can use in communication with customers and clients
partners.point4: Opportunity to join a partner program with benefits such as joint marketing and close follow-up

competitiveAdvantage.footer: NordicMedTek - Competitive advantage in care technology
